info.name: Inbox by Google Dark theme (not Gmail)  June 2017
info.description: ? Fixed and updated version of an out of date style Google Inbox by Google ( not Gmail) dark Theme by © Marco Costa https://userstyles.org/styles/114870/
info.additionalInfo: ✅ since inbox changed some stuff style was messed up. I've fixed them all. ✅ fixed the left side column color issue (background color) to make it easier to read since some people mentioned that it's not readable. ✅ hide useless & annoying hangouts button on the top navbar! all credit goes to: https://userstyles.org/styles/124114/inbox-hide-hangouts ⚠️ If something that's messed up send me a tweet @s3micolon ✅ NEW (June 08, 2017): Brought back Hangouts button due to many requests :) ✅ NEW (March 12, 2017): Brought back Hangouts button due to many requests :) ? My Other Styles: ? Facebook Wide Flat Material ⛔️ No Ads ✅ Updated ? https://userstyles.org/styles/137191/ ? Twitter Night Mode ✅ Wider TL ⛔ No Ads ✚ Tweaks ? https://userstyles.org/styles/135613/ ⚡️ Twitter Wide Material Design ⛔️ No Ads ✚ Tweaks ? https://userstyles.org/styles/

data.title: only Dark theme for Inbox by Google
I have some additional CSS tweaks to suggest
Needs a slight tweak to work with tampermonkey/others
Doesn't work with Tampermonkey, at all
